channel.title: Projects on Hongbin Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hongbin Liu

item.title: Bintorch
item.description: A simple replication of PyTorch using numpy and autograd. This project is to help someone who would like to understand what is behind the scene without reading the complicated c++ code, as well as those who wants to know how deep learning framework works in general.

item.title: Readpapers
item.description: An iOS App made for searching and downloading academic papers from Arxiv and Sci-hub.

item.title: Air Presentation - PPT remote
item.description: This is a hobby project done for fun.
